channel.title: Webhooks on Daddy's data analysis by Kazu Nozue
channel.description: Recent content in Webhooks on Daddy's data analysis by Kazu Nozue

item.title: Remote sensing 1.1: python -> Webhooks -> Google Sheet
item.description: Toward my goal for remote sensing of my yard soil, I would like to divide its porject into several modules. module 1. Automatically recording data in Google Sheet (from my computer to Google Sheet). module 2. Sensing soil data using Raspberry pi 3 model B. module 3. Combining 1 and 2 Setting up module 1 Since my Rasppberry pi 3 model 3 runs under Python, I would like to use Python in my computer to send some data to Google Sheet.
